articles.description: Fans are urged to hold on to tickets for the Bellahouston Park show after illness forced a postponement.
articles.content:
The Red Hot Chili Peppers have called off their Glasgow concert hours before the show due to illness.
The US band were due to perform at Bellahouston Park on Friday evening.
However, in a short sta… [+868 chars]
